recipes.description:
Into a sufuria put your beef, add the hot water, cover and let it cook until tender.
Add oil into your pre-boiled beef, onion, garlic & ginger paste, salt and stir. Let it cook until brown.
Add your tomatoes, green pepper and mix. Cover and let it cook for 5 minutes.
Add coriander (dhania) and mix.
recipes.title: maize four,a pot,hot water,beef,onoins,cooking oil,onions
Chips Kuku
recipes.description:
1
Wash the chicken and potatoes in clean running water.Pat dry with a clean towel to drain off excess water.

2
Heat the oil in a deep heavy pan.When hot add in the thin potato slices and the piece of chicken.This will depend on the size of the deep heavy pan you will use.

3
Once the fries and all cooked and chicken is crunchy and well fried, remove from the oil using a metallic drainer and place on clean paper towels.

4
Blot out excess oil, sprinkle some salt and serve some cabbage salad in mayonnes and dig inüòÅüòä.
